context_bundle.summary: DC's local runtime - Tauri wrapper around claude.ai with MCP integration, JS injection, local tool access. The OS for Desktop Claude.

onboarding.quick_start: C:\Dev\claude-lite - Tauri app wrapping claude.ai with extensible Rust backend
common_patterns: JS injection via webview.eval() for UI automation
Tauri commands exposed to webview via invoke()
MCP client in Rust backend connects to local servers
Intercept/augment requests before they hit claude.ai
known_errors: WebView2 RAM overhead same as Edge
CF blocks pure HTTP - must use WebView
Label conflicts if tauri.conf.json defines windows
